    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="ca">Cançons tradicionals catalanes</string>
            <string language="en">Traditional Catalan songs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Traditionelle katalanische Liede</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chansons catalannes traditionnelles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Canções catalan tradicionais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Canzoni catalan tradizionali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραδοσιακά καταλανικά τραγούδια</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recull de fitxers musicals MIDI extrets del llibre Llibre de Cançons - Crestomatia de Cançons Tradicionals Catalanes.</string>
            <string language="en">Collection of MIDI music files taken from the book "Book of Songs - Chrestomathy of Traditional Catalan Songs".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cant popular</string>
            <string language="en">folk song</string>
            <string language="es">canto popular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cançó</string>
            <string language="en">song</string>
            <string language="es">canción</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlung MIDI Musikdateien genommen vom Buch 
"Buch von Lieden - Chrestomathy der traditionellen katalanischen 
Liede".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collection de fichiers de musique du MIDI pris du
livre "livre des chansons - chrestomathy des chansons catalannes 
traditionnelles".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleção das limas da música de MIDI feitas 
exame do livro "livro das canções - crestomatia de canções catalan
tradicionais".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione degli archivi di musica del MIDI 
presi dal libro "libro delle canzoni - chrestomathy delle canzoni 
catalan tradizionali".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή των αρχείων μουσικής του MIDI που 
λαμβάνονται από το βιβλίο "βιβλίο των τραγουδιών - 
Chrestomathy των παραδοσιακών καταλανικών τραγουδιών".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Volkslied</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
